main event: A strange object that was initially thought to be an aircraft was determined to be a pilot balloon target.
interesting points: The object was initially reported as a strangely moving aircraft.
The witness filmed the object on August 22nd and it was in possession by August 23rd.
The witness visited a hangar about the 'flying saucer' and was asked to provide more information.
The object was described as having a wood construction, monoplane design, and paper-like materials.
Another report described an object appearing in the sky, moving very swiftly and rapidly before disappearing.
sighted object: pilot balloon target, strange aircraft-like object
photographs: yes, the report includes a filmed object
